      Returns fee for operation.
      io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.AssetAmount> getFee(BaseOperation op)
      Returns fee for operation.
      io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.AssetAmount> getFeeForType(OperationType type, ChainObject assetId)
      Returns fee for operation type, not valid for operation per size fees: OperationType.ASSET_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSET_ISSUE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_UPDATE_OPERATION, OperationType.WITHDRAW_PERMISSION_CLAIM_OPERATION, OperationType.CUSTOM_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSERT_OPERATION, OperationType.CONTENT_SUBMIT_OPERATION
      io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.AssetAmount> getFeeForType(OperationType type)
      Returns fee for operation type, not valid for operation per size fees: OperationType.ASSET_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSET_ISSUE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_UPDATE_OPERATION, OperationType.WITHDRAW_PERMISSION_CLAIM_OPERATION, OperationType.CUSTOM_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSERT_OPERATION, OperationType.CONTENT_SUBMIT_OPERATION
      io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getFees(java.util.List<? extends ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.BaseOperation> op, ChainObject assetId)
      Returns fees for operation.
      io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getFees(java.util.List<? extends ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.BaseOperation> op)
      Returns fees for operation.
      io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getFeesForType(java.util.List<? extends ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.OperationType> types, ChainObject assetId)
      Returns fees for operation type, not valid for operation per size fees: OperationType.ASSET_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSET_ISSUE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_UPDATE_OPERATION, OperationType.WITHDRAW_PERMISSION_CLAIM_OPERATION, OperationType.CUSTOM_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSERT_OPERATION, OperationType.CONTENT_SUBMIT_OPERATION
      io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getFeesForType(java.util.List<? extends ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.OperationType> types)
      Returns fees for operation type, not valid for operation per size fees: OperationType.ASSET_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSET_ISSUE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_UPDATE_OPERATION, OperationType.WITHDRAW_PERMISSION_CLAIM_OPERATION, OperationType.CUSTOM_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSERT_OPERATION, OperationType.CONTENT_SUBMIT_OPERATION
      io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getPotentialSignatures(Transaction transaction)
      This method will return the set of all public keys that could possibly sign for a given transaction. This call can be used by wallets to filter their set of public keys to just the relevant subset prior to calling get_required_signatures() to get the minimum subset.
      io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getRequiredSignatures(Transaction transaction, java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.crypto.Address> keys)
      This API will take a partially signed transaction and a set of public keys that the owner has the ability to sign for and return the minimal subset of public keys that should add signatures to the transaction.
      io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.ProcessedTransaction> validateTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Validates a transaction against the current state without broadcasting it on the network.
      io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> verifyAccountAuthority(java.lang.String nameOrId, java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.crypto.Address> keys)
      Verifies if the signers have enough authority to authorize an account.
      io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> verifyAuthority(Transaction transaction)
      Verifies required signatures of a transaction.

      • Methods inherited from class ch.decent.sdk.api.BaseApi

        getApi

    • Method Detail

      • getRequiredSignatures

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getRequiredSignatures(Transaction transaction,
                                                                 java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.crypto.Address> keys)

        This API will take a partially signed transaction and a set of public keys that the owner has the ability to sign for and return the minimal subset of public keys that should add signatures to the transaction.

        Parameters:
        transaction - partially signed transaction
        keys - available owner public keys
        Returns:
        public keys that should add signatures

      • getPotentialSignatures

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getPotentialSignatures(Transaction transaction)

        This method will return the set of all public keys that could possibly sign for a given transaction. This call can be used by wallets to filter their set of public keys to just the relevant subset prior to calling get_required_signatures() to get the minimum subset.

        Parameters:
        transaction - unsigned transaction
        Returns:
        public keys that can sign transaction

      • verifyAuthority

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> verifyAuthority(Transaction transaction)

        Verifies required signatures of a transaction.

        Parameters:
        transaction - signed transaction to verify
        Returns:
        if the transaction has all of the required signatures

      • verifyAccountAuthority

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> verifyAccountAuthority(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                                                                     java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.crypto.Address> keys)

        Verifies if the signers have enough authority to authorize an account.

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - account name or object id
        keys - signer keys
        Returns:
        if the signers have enough authority

      • validateTransaction

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.ProcessedTransaction> validateTransaction(Transaction transaction)

        Validates a transaction against the current state without broadcasting it on the network.

        Parameters:
        transaction - signed transaction
        Returns:
        class ProcessedTransaction or fails with exception DCoreException

        Parameters:
        op - list of operations
        assetId - asset id eg. DCT id is 1.3.0

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getFeesForType(java.util.List<? extends ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.OperationType> types,

        Returns fees for operation type, not valid for operation per size fees: OperationType.ASSET_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSET_ISSUE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_CREATE_OPERATION, OperationType.PROPOSAL_UPDATE_OPERATION, OperationType.WITHDRAW_PERMISSION_CLAIM_OPERATION, OperationType.CUSTOM_OPERATION, OperationType.ASSERT_OPERATION, OperationType.CONTENT_SUBMIT_OPERATION

        Parameters:
        types - operation types
        Returns:
        a fee asset amount
